corebehrt.azure.main.helpers module

corebehrt.azure.main.helpers.parse_pair_args(pair_args: list) → dict[source]

Parses the append arguments. Each argument is expected to be of the form <key>=<value>

Parameters:

args – List of arguments to be parsed.

Returns:

a dict/mapping from key to value
